tree.name: Nikola Vucevic
tree.tradeDescription: Celtics trade Simons + 2026 2nd to Bulls for Vucevic + 2027 2nd (DEN own)

assetsGivenUp.name: Anfernee Simons
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics acquire Simons for Jrue Holiday. Boston also received trade exception.
assetsGivenUp.note: Simons had brief Celtics tenure before being flipped for Vucevic

assetsGivenUp.name: Jrue Holiday
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Part of Damian Lillard mega-trade. Celtics give up Brogdon, Rob Williams, 2024 1st (GSW), 2029 1st
assetsGivenUp.note: 2024 NBA Champion - key two-way player in title run

assetsGivenUp.name: Malcolm Brogdon
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics acquire Brogdon for Nesmith, Theis, and 2023 1st

assetsGivenUp.name: Aaron Nesmith
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted with pick acquired from Memphis (Jeff Green trade)

assetsGivenUp.name: 2020 1st Round Pick (#14, from MEM)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Jeff Green trade. Pick was heavily protected, finally conveyed in 2020 as #14

assetsGivenUp.name: Jeff Green
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics acquire Green for Kendrick Perkins and Nate Robinson
assetsGivenUp.note: Green missed 2012 season for heart surgery

assetsGivenUp.name: Kendrick Perkins
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Draft night trade. Celtics send Dahntay Jones + Troy Bell for Marcus Banks + Perkins
assetsGivenUp.note: Perkins was key to 2008 championship, tore ACL in 2010 Finals Game 6

assetsGivenUp.name: Dahntay Jones
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted with pick acquired from 76ers (Moïso trade)

assetsGivenUp.name: 2003 1st Round Pick (#20, from PHI)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics trade Jérôme Moïso for Roshown McLeod and lottery-protected 1st

assetsGivenUp.name: Jérôme Moïso
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick
assetsGivenUp.note: THE ULTIMATE ORIGIN. Celtics drafted Moïso 11th overall out of UCLA. Massive bust - played 24 games, averaged 1.5 PPG. His selection started a 26-year chain.

assetsGivenUp.name: Troy Bell
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Part of package for Perkins. Never played in NBA. Celtics own pick.

assetsGivenUp.name: Nate Robinson
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Draft night trade - part of the Rajon Rondo trade complex
assetsGivenUp.note: 3x Slam Dunk Contest winner. Flipped to OKC for Jeff Green.

assetsGivenUp.name: Daniel Theis
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Re-acquired from Houston in deadline deal for Schroder, Fernando, Kanter
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally signed by Celtics as free agent 2017, traded to Bulls 2021, returned 2022

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Conveyed to Indiana in Brogdon trade. Pacers selected Ben Sheppard.

assetsGivenUp.name: Robert Williams III
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Time Lord. 2024 NBA Champion (traded after). Celtics own pick - TRUE ORIGIN.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 1st Round Pick (GSW conditional)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Originally GSW pick acquired by Celtics. Conveyed to Portland.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick (most favorable)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Orlando in Noah Penda trade (June 2025)
assetsGivenUp.note: Part of Vucevic trade to Chicago
